name: Pup in the Park
description:
Pup in the Park, an interactive transformation text story/game.

An anthropomorphic dog approaches you in the park! Your actions will affect the story.

This game contains adult sexual content. The player selects the sex for each character at the start of the game and there are other features that are customizable as well. The sexual content includes M/M, M/F, and F/F scenes depending on how the player customizes the characters. There is also a scene involving hermaphrodite content. It is easy to avoid specific content of the undesired sex.

This is Version 1.01 of Pup in the Park. You can find more games on my Patreon, discord, and FurAffinity accounts with the specific links listed on the first page of the actual game. If you would like to support me, then become a patron at https://www.patreon.com/desirelines and you will receive access to early content and strategy guides for my games.
